## 1. Pre-vetting
Our GPT-proof assessment
Most recruiters & job sites match you with candidates based on their **resumes**.We've found a better way to hire — we built a simulatorthat tests our candidates on **real-life support scenarios**. Since our assessment is based on real situations, it's a much more reliable indicator of performance than **resume screens**.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63239b5ca485224680ef4fc9/63e2c7c7334bfb5a79b6c6e6_Step1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63239b5ca485224680ef4fc9/66faed076f4190e85b115f2c_Step2.svg)
## 2. Matching
Find the perfect match
Somewhere out there in the world, there's the perfect match for your company. We parse each candidate's experience, and highlight **transferrable skills** from their previous work experience.
In other words, we’ve designed our process to fit **your specific hiring needs**.
## 3. Interviews
Hire effectively
**We make it easy to interview great candidates.** You can watch brief personal statements from each candidate, and book interviews with the best matches for your company.‍‍Loop integrates with your ATS, so you don’t need to change your existing workflows — we provide value from Day One.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63239b5ca485224680ef4fc9/66faed4d210d071130813fab_Step%203.png)

**Company Overview: Loop Support**

Founded in 2016 and hailing from the elite Y Combinator Batch W17, Loop Support is a San Francisco-based company on a straightforward mission: to accurately predict job applicant performance for entry-level support roles. With a lean team of seven, Loop is effectively carving out a niche in the recruiting landscape by replacing traditional hiring metrics with more reliable, performance-based assessments. 

**What They Do:**

Loop Support develops pre-employment assessments designed to simulate the real work scenarios that job applicants will face on the job. Instead of relying on resumes, which often paint an incomplete picture of a candidate's capabilities, Loop employs a unique approach that utilizes a "GPT-proof hiring assessment" to vet potential hires. This interactive assessment gauges critical skills like communication, problem-solving, speed, and aptitude by placing candidates in real-life support contexts. 

Their process is laid out in three primary steps:
1. **Pre-vetting**: Candidates are assessed through simulations that reflect actual job conditions rather than just their past experiences.
2. **Matching**: The system intelligently parses the candidates' backgrounds, highlighting transferable skills tailored to the hiring company's specific needs.
3. **Interviews**: Loop facilitates efficient interviews by allowing recruiters to view personal candidate statements and book interviews with the top matches seamlessly integrating with existing Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

**Key Metrics:**
- **77%** faster time-to-hire compared to traditional methods.
- **5x** increase in final screen pass rates.
- **97%** candidate satisfaction reflects their focus on creating a positive hiring experience. 
- Over **136,000 assessments** have been graded through their platform, demonstrating ongoing trust from over 100 client companies.

**Catering to the Candidate Experience:**
Loop places a strong emphasis on ensuring candidates have a positive experience during assessments. Many users express enjoyment with the assessment process, finding it engaging and reflective of real-world challenges they'll face if hired. This focus on a streamlined, candidate-friendly journey helps attract top talent, enhancing the companies’ appeal in a competitive job market.

**Conclusion:**
If you're looking to enhance your hiring process for support roles, Loop Support offers a compelling solution that combines modern technology with a focus on real-world performance. Their innovative approach not only reduces hiring time but also improves the quality of hires, making it a smart choice for businesses eager to find the right talent in an increasingly competitive environment. 

For more information or to see how Loop can improve your hiring, you can visit their website at [Loop Support](https://www.loopsupport.com/).
